author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERICK RAPIDLY INTENSIFYING AND FORECAST TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...EXPECTED TO BRING DAMAGING WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY...
summary: ...ERICK RAPIDLY INTENSIFYING AND FORECAST TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...EXPECTED TO BRING DAMAGING WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... As of 9:00 AM CST Wed Jun 18 the center of Erick was located near 13.9, -96.0 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERICK RAPIDLY INTENSIFYING AND FORECAST TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...EXPECTED TO BRING DAMAGING WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... As of 9:00 AM CST Wed Jun 18 the center of Erick was located near 13.9, -96.0 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary for Hurricane Erick (EP5/EP052025)
